reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest install of a screen protector!
reviews.reviewText: I am very particular when it comes to screen protectors. First off, I don't like them. I don't like the way they look and inevitably I always end up with one small bubble that drives me crazy. Maybe its my OCD, I don't know. When it's been necessary I've used Spigen screen protectors in the past because they would include an alignment tool that made installing them very simple. However with the iPhone 12 mini I almost bought a different brand because I don't like the screen protector cut out around the front facing camera. I'd rather the screen protector cover all of the glass on the front of the screen. Because I had used Spigen before I decided to stick with what I know. I'm very glad I did. This alignment tool that comes with the screen protector is the slickest thing out there right now. The screen protector is perfectly aligned and there are no bubbles and no flaws whatsoever. This was the easiest and best install ever. It works perfect, there is no screen lag at all, it works just as if nothing was on the screen. I haven't drop tested it for obvious reasons. Other than the cut out around the front camera you can't even tell there is a screen protector on the phone. I do wish Spigen would make a screen protector that covered the entire front screen but other than that, this product is amazing. I'm definitely a fan of the Spigen brand and will stick with them for my future products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is a must-have for iPhone users.
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend this product to ANYONE with an iPhone. I know for myself, I’m an absolute freak when it comes to protecting my screen and not getting it scratched. I’ve used several screen protectors before, many of them have been a tempered glass film that you lay over on your own over the phone screen. While those are okay, I find that it bothers me if it is not put on absolutely perfect with no bubbles or specks of dust underneath. I also have had screen protectors that hinder the touch screen functionality. My experience with them previously have been very lack luster, leading me to abandon them all together and just replacing the screen if it ever cracked.If this describes your previous experience with screen protectors on your phone, THIS PRODUCT IS FOR YOU. The plastic screen applier that this screen comes in is AMAZING. It comes with step-by-step instructions on how to apply the screen protector to your phone screen. After you apply the screen protector, it is PERFECT. It is completely symmetrical with no imperfections since the plastic applier has been 3D printed to fit the dimensions of your phone down to the thousandth of a millimeter. The box also comes with a screen cleaner and dust stickers to clean your screen with and remove dust easily before applying the screen protector. If your screen cracks or something goes wrong, THE BOX COMES WITH TWO TEMPERED GLASS SCREENS. This product is amazing and I would recommend this a million times over. I should also add that I have seen zero loss of functionality in the touch screen. It feels like it is not there at all, which is what I want, but I also have the peace of mind knowing if I do drop my phone, it will be protected. I know what product I will be purchasing again if I ever get a new phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy install
reviews.reviewText: The install was quick and easy and so far it’s been much more durable than the last cheaper brand I tried to use. The cheaper one has scratches from going in and out of my pocket within a week. This one is still looking pristine after two weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As the name says very easy fit
reviews.reviewText: It's a screen protector but it was actually so easy just to put it on and really didn't even have to follow a video guide. Just make sure that you follow everything that the instructions say to do and you will actually have a pretty good screen protector placed on your phone. I rate this a five mostly because it's so easy and I wish that other phones like galaxy's can have something like this too :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT for iPhone 12 Mini with OtterBox!!
reviews.reviewText: FINALLY!! A screen protector for my iPhone 12 Mini that doesn’t buckle & bubble with my OtterBox Defender case…YAY‼️I will NOT compromise my iPhone OtterBox Defender Cases for ANYTHING! Unfortunately the one for my iPhone 12 Mini doesn’t have a built-in screen protector…so I have to buy them separately. However…it was sooooooo annoying to have the last few screen protectors buckle/bubble up because it was either too big or off center.THIS one is PERFECT 👍🏻 I’m in my 70’s…and I installed it perfectly the very first time from the instruction video link provided in the box…so I now have the extra one for later if I need it.I found it very easy to put on withOUT air bubbles and/or dust stuck underneath. I am SO HAPPY to have purchased this!THANK YOU❣️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, does the job
reviews.reviewText: My current phone is the first in a long time for me to use a screen protector. But after several phones ending their lives with mild display scratches that did annoy me a bit, I decided to protect this one. My first purchase was a failure and almost made me change my mind about the whole deal. Then I decided to try the spigen.Application of this protector is easy. My only complaint is how wasteful it is. But I realized I literally don’t touch the actual protector until it’s fully applied, which likely aids in its quality of application and longevity.Unlike the first brand I purchased, there’s no issues with the adhesive so far. After weeks, it looks as good as the day I applied it.My only complaint is the fitment doesn’t make it as invisible as I would like. The first brand I got was much closer to the edges and only had a cutout for the speaker, not the entire notch. The sensors worked fine through the other protector, the adhesive just kept failing on it. So the edges of this one are ever present.Overall I recommend it. The applicator is nearly stupid proof. If you follow the directions you get no bubbles. There’s no lift nor other adhesive failure. And you get extra. This is also a brand that has been around a while and not a fly by night brand that will change names in 6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used this product several times, it has worked well
reviews.reviewText: I have used this screen cover several times. I've had an easy time applying these, and removing them when it's time for a new one. They held up pretty well for me.

This was super easier to install!! All I had to do was refer to the write up here, the enclosed instructions and bring up the video for a step by step visual (video location is in instructions). I installed on a new phone out of the box so was able to skip the dust / cleaning step. I was skeptical that it would fit like a glove. I thought I would mess that up. Not at all! The tool they include makes it goof proof :) It’s on perfectly aligned. Also, I’m using it with a Spigen case and they work perfectly together. I’ve had no issues with screen response and that includes perfect side, top and bottom navigation/gestures. Also, visible finger prints and swipe smudges are not excessive (easily cleaned with the included cleaning cloth anyway). Durability - I will have to see how it performs; it is too soon to really tell. I like that it comes with a spare screen just in case. Bottom line - I highly recommend!
Passgenau und stressfrei installiert, viel Zubehör wird mitgeliefert. Die Nutzung des Bildschirms im täglichen Gebrauch wird nicht beeinflusst und er wird optimal geschützt. Kaufempfehlung!

Se si vuole andare sul sicuro, questo è l'acquisto giusto. Confezione essenziale di due protezioni già inserite nei telaietti per il montaggio che risulta cosi facilitato e preciso. A corredo tutto il necessario per la pulizia dello schermo del cellulare prima dell'applicazione del vetro nonché le semplici istruzioni per un lavoro perfetto senza difficoltà. Costo adeguato alla qualità dei materiali. Amazon puntuale come sempre.
Outil de pose super pratique(Ou bien j’ai eu de la chance ;-) )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the best screen protectors I have ever used. Protector perfectly aligned and no signs of air bubbles. Cleverly designed frame that holds the protector whilst its being fitted makes the process very easy.Can’t really say anything about durability but, given the material used and look and feel I assume it is at least as good as others I have used.
